text: Esther Béjarano ( Löwy; 15 December 1924 – 10 July 2021) was a German singer. She was one of the last survivors of the Auschwitz concentration camp. With Anita Lasker-Wallfisch, she played in the Women's Orchestra of Auschwitz. Béjarano was born in Saarlouis, Germany. She was a co-founder and chairman of the International Auschwitz Committee and honorary chairperson of the Union of Persecutees of the Nazi Regime. Béjarano died on 10 July 2021 in Hamburg, aged 96. ==References== Category:1924 births Category:2021 deaths Category:German singers Category:Jewish German musicians Category:Holocaust survivors
title: Esther Béjarano
